showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ workers! ! ! America already great again or ..? . When you tired and walking around 40 min for shower , workers just smoking outside  and smile. Half showers empty and waiting for service but workers have personal plans! If you try to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I waited 20 minutes on a Shower and I go to put my code in and it rejected the code and placed me 2 spots behind the other drivers. I‚Äôve wasted 40 minutes of my life on this insufficient truck stop.  1/10 don‚Äôt recommend

Showers were disgusting. It was the only reason I came here because Flying J is usually known for having decent showers. I went in and there was trash on the floor, hadn't been mopped in forever, haven't been swept in forever. The shower ‚Ä¶
Very nice Flying J.The facility was very clean and well stocked.Employees were very friendly and courteous.Shower was exceptionally clean.
Better than most. Did a reset here and noticed a full time effort to keep the barrels empty and litter picked up outside. Friendly staff. Clean shower. ‚Ä¶

‚ÄúNO FUNGUS‚Äù is impossible for me to pass by & not stop here to shower. The night shift manager, very nice lady. The other lady at night very nice as well. The guy that cleans the showers do a great job.
He should get a raise.
This place as at truck driver , if you need at shower long time wait even if is available becouse their not clean the showers you have service on everything is bad

‚Ä¶ . Also, they have the normal PFJ breakfast food. I only gave 3 stars because it takes too damn long to get a shower here. Not sure if it's just the clientele takes too damn long in the showers or if staff doesn't clean them fast enough. If ‚Ä¶
Worst and the most disgusting pilot shower I‚Äôve ever been to. They didn‚Äôt even mop the floor or clean around the sink, there was hair all over the place.

Husband and I were waiting on a shower and got to observe the maintenance guy with the highlighter vest clean it. He used the dirty towel from the previous occupant and mopped up the water. BOOM! Clean and sanitized according to the sign on ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Restroom clean, shower clean. Inside clean, coffee machine clean, staff friendly. Dunkin‚Äô Donuts good all donuts was fresh.But Gely donuts üç© not in stock, it‚Äôs bad , manager if you exist review, please add jelly stock Dunkin‚Äô Donuts ‚Ä¶

Let‚Äôs start with the showers . I went to take a shower and the restrooms in the shower area we gross . The shower in shower #2 was clogged so it was like taking a bath . It was black mold growing all over the walls. I have asthma so that‚Äôs ‚Ä¶
Got up an hour early to get shower and was told they had no showers because no one came to work so no one to clean showers. Guess it's about time to switch to LOVES.

They need to start really cleaning their showers. I‚Äôm convinced that when a customer is done with a shower, employees simply put towels inside without bothering to clean or dry the soaked floor, bench, mirror, etc. Other parts of the store ‚Ä¶

Still some spot available at night

You can 't wait for a shower , the workers aren 't in a hurry , damn it

Floor had some lint on it but shower was pretty clean overall

Night shift doesn't clean shower's properly after every use. They just go in with fresh towels then take out the old. Then wipe the floors and sink with a towel to dry. No cleaning solutions sprayed to clean or kill germs.7/11/19

‚Ä¶ star. Parkedmy semi and went in to freshen up and get something to eat. Every seat in the ladies room had either poop or blood or both so I asked to use the shower room. Cockroaches all over the place and filthy in their too! Had enough ‚Ä¶
Pretty good overall. My problem is the shower towels, they stink! They also leave you covered in lint pills. Idk how to describe the smell of the towels other than rancid.

showerReviews.reviewText: Absolutely the worst Loves I've ever been to . Fueled then Parked to go shower on 6-28-2023 . Purchased a shower and proceeded to shower 6 , shower had NOT been cleaned.  Walked to fuel desk to inform clerk and as I was barely able to say 2 ‚Ä¶

The customer service provided was unsatisfactory. The driver was denied access to the shower facilities despite being a team driver, and was subsequently asked to leave the store by the district manager, Mr. Green. This incident raises ‚Ä¶

I stopped at this place for laundry, shower and lube service , people at the lube are not friendly since yesterday and today I checked with some one but not happy at all ,‚Äù wait ‚Äú I could  see clearly what‚Äôs going there the lube doors were ‚Ä¶

We arrived at the gas station and to the shower, all the showers were free, we asked for a large shower room, a dark man with orange dyed hair gave us a small dirty shower room, after that we still insisted on a large shower room but in ‚Ä¶

Loud obnoxious music being played in the shower area by the employee cleaning.   Rude and disrespectful employees at counter to check out.  They were more concerned with their telephone call in their ear.  Coffee was full of grounds and ‚Ä¶
Love stop #326 refuses to honor my free shower because the system is ‚Äúdown‚Äù ‚Ä¶

Had a nice hot shower and didn't have to wait because I got the last one around 9am on Wed. Sink pressure in shower #1 wasn't very good so -1*, but otherwise a good shower visit. Clean enough, fresh towels and plenty of soap and TP ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ lol. Well, he waited and after he asked someone and the worker announced that she should come back to her store(subway) the guy was upset and as I said she was not happy to be there. The towels in the shower too was needing an updating. ‚Ä¶
If you can‚Äôt get a shower during the day, don‚Äôt try overnight here. Makes no sense to renovate a store, but fail to provide sufficient assistance for overnight. ‚Ä¶
Ordered shower though app. They somehow gave somebody else my shower
